explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing blue jeans and black socks is holding a bouquet of red and white roses. He stands in front of a TV with his right hand raised, extending one finger. On the TV screen, a woman with pink hair wearing a black dress is sitting on a sofa with her arms crossed over her chest.

[0-4] The man takes a step back and holds the flowers in front of the woman on the TV. The woman widens her eyes in surprise, covers her mouth with both hands, and looks at the man. [16-24] In the last scene, a man in a black and white short-sleeved shirt and blue jean shorts, wearing sunglasses, holds a bottle of drink in front of the TV. On the TV is a cat wearing a flame-shaped hat. The man raises the drink in front of the cat. The cat widens its eyes and sticks out its tongue. The man then looks at the camera in surprise. The cat on the TV is standing on a skateboard, then spins around. After stopping, it looks at the drink in the man's hand. The man turns back and raises the drink in front of the cat again.
